CustomField.description: If this opportunity was created(or updated) by converting a lead, displays hyperlink to a report containing details of lead(s) converted into this opportunity. Users do not need to have "View and Edit Converted Leads" permission to view lead details on the report. Clicking on a converted lead on the report will take such users to the contact record instead of the lead. Displays blank if opportunity hasn't been involved in a lead conversion.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: View converted lead details if this opportunity was created by lead conversion.
CustomField.label: Converted Lead
